description: The main entry point for a Vue.js application, setting up the app instance, including plugins Pinia (state management) and router, and mounting the app to the DOM.

methods.name: createApp
methods.description: Creates a new Vue application instance with the root component 'App'.

methods.name: use
methods.description: Registers plugins or other features with the Vue application instance, such as Pinia and router.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Mounts the Vue application to a DOM element with the specified selector ('#app').
